TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit DataGridItemEventArgs extends System.EventArgs

summary.span: 提供資料給 控制項的 和 事件。

span.span: Provides data for the and events of the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 中的項目時，就會引發事件建立控制項。The event is raised when an item in the control is created. 中的項目時，就會引發事件控制項所繫結至資料來源。The event is raised when an item in the control is bound to a data source. 如需執行個體的初始屬性值的清單，請參閱建構函式。For a list of initial property values for an instance of , see the constructor. 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何指定及程式碼的處理常式事件，以在其中顯示順序中的項目會控制建立的。The following code example demonstrates how to specify and code a handler for the event to display the order in which the items in the control are created. [!code-aspx-csharp[Classic DataGridItemEventArgs Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic DataGridItemEventArgs Example/CS/sourcecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[Classic DataGridItemEventArgs Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic DataGridItemEventArgs Example/VB/sourcevb.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-csharp[DataGridItemDataBound#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/DataGridItemDataBound/CS/datagriditemdataboundcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[DataGridItemDataBound#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/DataGridItemDataBound/VB/datagriditemdataboundvb.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-csharp[DataGridItemDataBound2#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/DataGridItemDataBound2/CS/datagriditemdatabound2cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[DataGridItemDataBound2#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/DataGridItemDataBound2/VB/datagriditemdatabound2vb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用這個建構函式建立並初始化的新執行個體類別。Use this constructor to create and initialize a new instance of the class. 執行個體時建立呼叫這個建構函式時，由下列屬性會初始化為指定的值。When an instance of is created by a call to this constructor, the following property is initialized to the specified value. |項目Item|描述Description| |----------|-----------------| |項目Item|`item` 參數。The `item` parameter.| ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何建立和初始化的新執行個體類別。The following code example demonstrates how to create and initialize a new instance of the class. [!code-csharp[Classic DataGridItemEventArgs.DataGridItemEventArgs Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic DataGridItemEventArgs.DataGridItemEventArgs Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic DataGridItemEventArgs.DataGridItemEventArgs Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic DataGridItemEventArgs.DataGridItemEventArgs Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Item As DataGridItem

summary.span: 在引發事件時，取得 控制項中的參考項目。

span.span: Gets the referenced item in the control when the event is raised.

value.span: 在引發事件時， 控制項中的參考項目。

span.span: The referenced item in the control when the event is raised.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用這個屬性，以程式設計方式存取參考中的項目控制項時引發事件時。Use this property to programmatically access the item referenced in the control when the event is raised. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性中的顯示順序中的項目會控制建立的。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to display the order in which the items in the control are created.
